title: Social Experiment - No Chat
body:
Can we try a day with no chat options in league. No prematch or in game chat.
Pick order determining roles (take what's left, etc) 
Only use pings to communicate.

For just one day.... no toxic chat.... would be like a dream...

replies.body: would also be very difficult to people who are not toxic, they couldn't help a team mate out by telling them a item that is more productive on a champ, also pings can only do so much and you have limit on them, if the limit was taken away then the toxic people would just ping frenzy  out of the game. personally i just ignore the toxic people and communicate with the rest of my team instead of trying to deal with them
if you are at the elo where players cannot build properly it means you can probably just faceroll the enemy and carry.

thats true but also its good if someone is deciding between two items, and its just nice to have someone help you with your deciding, also its nice whenever your team does something good to "Good Job" or "Nice Work Team" them, it boost team moral and can win people the game, communication is everything in lol, so i think this is a silly idea, just my point of view

I see where u are coming from, unless you are smurfing from a higher elo it is harder to some-what carry, and you need your team to make the right choices so you win. 

but tbh, %%%%%%ed builds sometimes work so don't get hell tilty, I saw this olaf who was doing very mediocre, he had built botrk + hydra + boots, and we really needed a tank, but they didn't burst him down so he sustained through some of the fights insanely and that sort of won us the game, just because the enemy wasn't smart enough to 100-0 him without letting him make use of the lifesteal.

yeah and through communications you can tell people that they need to do certain things in team fifths where pings can't tell someone that, carrying aside, even just small things like telling a certain player to come push a lane while another certain player takes another tower and the rest push, how could you ping that and make it work? you probably could but would be hard.
Interesting idea. I have an idea to add - do this in Teambuilder, so there are no role issues, then expand it.

riot already did this back in 11 or some %%%%. cant find link to there experiment but they did a whole bunch of %%%% to influence toxicity in lol. 

Id say just drag your chat off screen and leave just a little bit on the screen to drag back when u need
